name: Slingshot
description: Slingshot DAO is a decentralized gaming ecosystem that empowers communities to fund, vote on, and co-own games, starting with the Roblox platform and expanding into other digital media. It provides game developers with funding and publishing support through a community-driven governance model, where users lock $SLING tokens to participate in decision-making. The platform utilizes blockchain technology, AI-powered analytics, and Web3 infrastructure to streamline game development, integrate decentralized IP ownership, and reward active contributors. With gasless transactions on Arbitrum Layer 3 and an instant bridging mechanism, Slingshot DAO enables seamless participation, making it one of the most accessible and scalable Web3 gaming launchpads in the industry.
